description: Round N+31: Make vault generation reliable by carving partition-style vaults out of existing normal rooms (with fallback), plus regression coverage.
notes: This file exists to make cumulative patch zips deterministic: include every file listed here (latest version) plus any newly changed/added files each round.
If you do not need cumulative patches, you can ignore this file.

patch_info.description: Round N+31: Make vault generation reliable by carving partition-style vaults out of existing normal rooms (with fallback), plus regression coverage.

summary: Vault generation now prefers partition-vaults: it splits an existing normal room with a wall line and places a single locked door into that partition, creating a sealed vault alcove without requiring large solid-wall blocks.
Falls back to the original wall-carve vault method when no suitable room can be partitioned (e.g., certain maze/cavern layouts).
Added a regression test that scans seeds and asserts at least one vault entrance is a partition-style locked door embedded in a wall line.
